price: ߊ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߛߞߎ߬ߦߟߊ߬ ߞߎߡߊߞߊ߲߫ ߘߌ߫ ߝߋߎ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊߒߠߊߞߏ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߜߋ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
